sections.heading: order; appeal.Any owner or operator served with an administrative order of a district may, within thirty days after service of the administrative order, appeal to the district court in the county in which a majority of the land is located
sections.text: The appeal shall be de novo and shall be conducted in accord

2-4611.Administrative order; appeal.

Any owner or operator served with an administrative order of a district may, within thirty days after service of the administrative order, appeal to the district court in the county in which a majority of the land is located. The appeal shall be de novo and shall be conducted in accordance with section 2-4613.

SourceLaws 1986, LB 474, ยง 11.
